name: Army Truck Simulator 2019
description:
Army Bus Off Road Simulator gives you a chance to become an army bus driver soldier one of my army men! Featuring Army bus driving delivering the gears of war, this army exercise delivers an awesome driving experience that will make you feel like an army truck driver. Help your country at army invasion by passing army mission! Play this army new game and pass your military operation games, make money and purchase new trucks to upgrade.


Features:
• 3 Army truck brands
• More than 8 military missions
• Easy controls
• Realistic graphics
• Great engine SFX
• Military Vehicles
